name: Au Banque
description:
Created for the https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-85-gold game jam.

You play as a thief - Lario - and have have 60 seconds to pull off an ever-escalating series of heists.

A, DMove left/rightSDrop through platformsSpaceJumpEPick up Gold or PushLMBThrow
